resources.string: Here you have the option to manage your flashcard decks by creating, removing, or modifying one or more decks. You also have the option to study a flashcard deck. Decks can be pre-made decks or user-created ones.
Here you have the option to select between studying vocab or grammar.
Your language learning journey starts here. Choose an option below and see where it takes you!
Here you have the ability to select flashcard decks to study vocab from.
Create a new deck of flashcards
Remove a current deck of flashcards
Edit a current deck of flashcards
Create a term-definition pair below and select Add to add the flashcard to your new deck.
